attributes.review:
A truly Disgusting individual that only works to promote hate, racism, and violence. Just throw him away!!! We need to move past this point in history into a new brighter future one where hopefully our presidential nominees don’t have any sexual assault allegations against them...sheesh!

Please put a women in office 🙏🏼
attributes.title: BE GONE

attributes.review: i first open the app to see a cheeto holding up his fist for black lives matter when he is a RACIST cheeto. then the app asked me for my phone number that is personal information that you don’t need. this is a disgrace. this app is HORRIBLE i’m not even gonna make an account and i will NEVER be a trump supporter.
attributes.title: HORRIFIC

attributes.review: This app is absolutely not worth it. It’s glitchy and I think it gave my phone viruses!! It started to heat up and my screen turned bright orange before a giant Cheeto man appeared. It was an absolutely terrifying and traumatic experience. This app is the definition of garbage. Whatever you do, don’t download 😤
attributes.title: Absolutely Tragic

attributes.review:
First of all the app glitches so much!! It’s worse than when you explode a bunch of tnt in Minecraft! Second of all 
My🤚name👄is👀not❌five👏weenies🌭i🔥am😎shoto❄️from😳UA🏫and👈i👁wanna✨be💫a😝hero💂‍♂️

attributes.title: Absolutely disgusting 🤢🤢🤢

attributes.review: This app caused my phone to glitch out so much! When my storage was getting full I started deleting some apps and once I deleted this one my phone stopped glitching. DO NOT download this app unless you want your phone to break! Absolutely terrible!
attributes.title: Terrible!

attributes.review: As soon as I opened it I saw his face and I couldn’t help but throw up a little. It’s also very glitchy and I can’t stand glitches because it makes my phone 100x more laggy and it’s bad please get this off the App Store because of how bad it is thank you.
attributes.title: Horrible

attributes.review: It’s a waste of space the app constantly crashes and freezes when trying to do anything. When logging in, the app constantly told me that my information was WRONG when it wasn’t. Plus there’s no reason to support him anyway
attributes.title: DO NOT DOWNLOAD

attributes.review: 0/10 this app took 3 blue moons to download and was frankly a waste of time. And when it did download it would start playing some sort of song and then rats moving in a conga line started to come into my house shouting “rats, we are the rats” Most traumatic experience of my life.
attributes.title: No flavor

attributes.review: Terrible app it took weeks to download and made my iPhone glitch into multiple different apps it played terrible music couldn’t do anything all week my phone was blasting loud music everywhere I go!!!!!! Terrible app don’t recommend to anybody but racists people!!
